title: Login Issues
body:
Havent played for about 6 months.

I come back on and do the updates but when i go to log in it says 'cant connect with server, retrying'

it attempts that 3 times then says sorry couldn't log in sort of thing, has anyone come across this?

replies.body:
No, I have not. Sounds like a very specific weird connection issue. The fact that you're getting to the login screen means that your computer is successfully communicating with Riot's servers, but the lack of login suggests simply a slow internet speed, *or* specific clunks of data not being permitted to be passed through.

Do you have all instances of League of Legends white-listed on your firewall?
